about_the_game:
It's time to Mount Up Rider! Restock on important supplies as you prepare for the journey into the frozen tundra of Parna's Coast! The new Adventurer Package Plus provides you with essential items that will be vital to your exploration! The package includes the following items:

◾ Ellun Box (462)

◾ Designer Bag (24 Slot)

◾ 100% Health Recovery Potion (x20)

◾ 100% Familiar Energy Recovery Potion (x20)

Limit 1 Adventurer Package Plus per account. Package is not transferable.

short_description: Take the battle to the sky with fantastical flying mount combat unlike anything you’ve seen before in Riders of Icarus, the new unprecedented action-adventure MMORPG experience that lets you ride and fight on the back of the realm’s most dangerous winged beasts…dragons.
